flavorText: The Phyrexians don't want to conquer Dominaria. They want to remake it.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Phyrexianer wollen Dominaria nicht erobern. Sie wollen es neu bauen.
foreignData.name: Planetenüberlagerung
foreignData.text: Jeder Spieler bestimmt von jedem Standardlandtyp ein Land, das er kontrolliert. Bringe diese Länder auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: Les Phyrexians ne veulent pas conquérir Dominaria. Ils veulent la modeler à leur image.
foreignData.name: Recouvrement des plans
foreignData.text: Chaque joueur choisit un terrain qu'il contrôle de chaque type de terrain de base. Renvoyez ces terrains dans les mains de leurs propriétaires.

name: Planar Overlay
originalText: Each player chooses a land he or she controls of each basic land type. Return those lands to their owners' hands.

rulings.text: If you have a land which counts as multiple land types, you can choose that land as each of those types. For example, a dual land could be chosen as two of your land types.

text: Each player chooses a land they control of each basic land type. Return those lands to their owners' hands.
